text.div:
Clostridium Difficile Test

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    10895-1 Clostridium difficile toxin B [Presence] in Stool
    13957-6 Clostridium difficile toxin A [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
